TopicTitle: Solar Panels always blocked by some part of the ship.

Articles.Content:
Well, I'm tired of having my solar panels keep saying blocked by things that aren't even in their way.

Is there a mod or a fix or something to stop this annoying blocking from happening? I'm making a kethane sattelite and one of the solar panels say BLOCKED BY KOSMOS SOLAR PANEL and the other Says BLOCKED BY PROBE CORE, When i need those parts!

Is there a way to never get blocked again
It's not clear to me what you mean. Are the panels on the side facing the sun claiming to be blocked even though nothing is in the way?

It's not clear to me what you mean. Are the panels on the side facing the sun claiming to be blocked even though nothing is in the way?

Yes you are correct.
This sounds like a question where screenshots would help.
